item.title: SSL
item.description: Tools sslscan # Scan target SSL version sslscan <TARGET> Fix old ssl protocol connection problem # Edit /etc/ssl/openssl.cnf [system_default_sect] #MinProtocol = DEFAULT@SECLEVEL=2 MinProtocol = None #CipherString = DEFAULT@SECLEVEL=2 CipherString = None Note: Remember to revert the changes after job done
